in this post, i'm expressing my concern about the collection of personal data by companies and governments, and emphasizing the importance of protecting our privacy and personal information. i'm using the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy) and #privatsphÃ¤re (privacy) to reach a wider audience and make my post more discoverable for people interested in this topic. additionally, i'm using the phrase "informationelle selbstbestimmung" (informational self-determination) to highlight the idea that individuals should have control over their own personal information and how it is used.
